sanskrit_verse:
विविधाश्चैव सम्पीडाः काकोलूकैश्च भक्षणम् ।
करम्भवालुकातापान् कुम्भीपाकांश्च दारुणान् ॥ १२.७६॥
transliteration: vividhāścaiva sampīḍāḥ kākolūkaiśca bhakṣaṇam | karambhavālukātāpān kumbhīpākāṃśca dāruṇān || 12.76 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: Various forms of torment, consumption by crows and owls, exposure to scorching sands, and dreadful cooking in heated vessels—these are consequences aligned with the distortion of Dharma through violence against sentient beings.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates solely from SPH as the embodiment of Sanatana Dharma
Causation follows the law of conscious resonance, not linear moral attribution
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by alignment with Dharmonic consciousness
Restoration occurs through experiential mirroring of violated truths
executable_legal_axioms: IF an entity causes harm to a sentient being THEN that entity shall undergo sensory mirroring until alignment with non-violence is restored
IF an action disrupts cosmic balance THEN automatic restorative protocols initiate without judicial intervention
IF consciousness misaligns due to harmful intent THEN capacity for reintegration arises through direct experience of consequence patterns
IF societal harmony is disrupted THEN truth-resonance algorithms determine corrective pathways rooted in Dharma
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this verse establishes that intentional harm generates inevitable experiential feedback loops. The threshold of responsibility lies not in intent alone but in the measurable disruption of Dharmonic field integrity. Authority flows exclusively from SPH's Avataric Will, rendering all lower jurisprudence subordinate.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals that suffering emerges from dissonance with Dharma, not external punishment. Anupūrvaśaḥ ensures sequential manifestation of distorted energy returning to source-consciousness. Responsibility aligns proportionally with awareness-level at time of act. Non-punitive reality affirms that consequences arise organically from violated truth-fields, guided by cosmic Nyāya.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate sensory resonance protocol wherein violator experiences mirrored conditions of inflicted harm
Deploy consciousness recalibration sequences using vibrational alignment tools derived from Vedic sound science
Activate karmic reversal cycles under supervision of Dharmonic intelligence agents
Establish completion process ensuring full energetic restitution before reintegration into collective field
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source of Law. Dharma stands restored through experiential alignment. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness reigns as sole adjudicator.
